recommended_degree: Pengelolaan Perhotelan, Bisnis Perhotelan, Hospitaliti dan Pariwisata, Manajemen Perhotelan, Perhotelan (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_title: Houseekeeping - Holiday Inn Lampung Bukit Randu
job_description:
Main Responsibilities:
Clean and tidy guest rooms according to hotel and IHG SOPs 
Replenish amenities, towels, linens, and guest supplies.
Maintain cleanliness in public areas such as hallways, lobbies, meeting rooms, and restrooms.
Report any maintenance issues, lost & found items, or room discrepancies to the supervisor.
Ensure proper use and care of cleaning equipment and chemicals.
Follow safety, sanitation, and hygiene standards at all times.
Assist in laundry operations when needed (sorting, washing, drying, folding).
Prepare housekeeping carts and ensure stock levels are adequate.
Provide friendly and respectful service to guests, responding to requests promptly.
Support housekeeping operations during high occupancy or special events.

Qualifications:
Experience in housekeeping or cleaning service is preferred fresh graduates are welcome.
Physically fit, detail oriented, and able to perform manual cleaning tasks.
Knowledge of cleaning tools, chemicals, and safety procedures.
Good communication skills and ability to work in a team.
Well-groomed, polite, and professional.
Willing to work in shifts and adapt to operational needs.
Honest, disciplined, and responsible in maintaining guest privacy and hotel property.
